ygData.subject: Re: Imbrued
ygData.msgSnippet: I submitted updated screenshots of all the imbrued plate to EQLiz r, but they have yet to post it. The only piece that didn t get an ac boost was the bracer.
ygData.messageBody:
I submitted updated screenshots of all the imbrued plate to EQLiz'r, but
they have yet to post it. The only piece that didn't get an ac boost was
the bracer.

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana


> Last night I suffered 5 deaths in Hate. However, the very first scorn
>
> banshee pull yielded Imbrued Legs and I won the lotto!!! WOO HOO! I
> immediately saw that the stats on the spoiler sites were incorrect
> regarding
> the AC. Did anyone ever get a list of the AC upgrades to Imbrued?
> Other
> stats were the same so I'm assuming they just gave the armor an AC
> buff. If
> anyone could direct me to a website or list the AC changes I'd
> appreciate
> it.
>
> Anthem Dirgemaker
> Level 49 Bard of Qeynos Solusek Ro
> Anthem
> Level 2 Bard of Qeynos Inoruuk
